summary: This is an email chain forwarded by attorney Stacey Richman, originating from Mark L. Epstein, who received a concerning email from an individual with the initials 'R O'. The email suggests that unknown parties have detailed knowledge of Mark Epstein's life and have been discussing him in phone conversations.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein received a warning email in May 2020 stating unknown parties had detailed knowledge of his life and were discussing him in phone calls.
Attorney Stacey Richman forwarded this email chain, indicating a potential attorney-client relationship and legal concern.
The email suggests Mark L. Epstein may have been under some form of surveillance or scrutiny by unidentified individuals in 2020.
